JobFullDesc: Sr Full Stack Engineer (GraphQL,D3.js,React)Remote USASimple, intuitive User Experiences are the foundation for augmenting human intelligence in the world of tomorrow.  As Artificial Intelligence becomes a dominant force in every walk of like, humans will need new ways to understand and explore infinite amounts of data around them.The future is here but less than 2% of all data generated in the last few years has been explored and exploited.  Research Science in UX/UI is all about breaking new ground and inventing ways to help any person or business explore and answer their most urgent questions about how data is related and how it can solve their business problem. Pioneering new ways to drive insights from massively parallel data-intensive Graphs, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to visualizing meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets as we shape brand new UI’s that will evolve the UX in 2D and eventually 3D interfaces with AR and VR. Our Emerging Technologies team is a focused, fast-paced group of highly self-driven researchers spearheading the latest ideas that will become the foundation of businesses in the future.  What you’ll achieveYou will be leading our human-centric interface work and developing new experiences aimed at making all data intuitively accessible to every person.  You will create new user experiences for humans to derive intelligence from the data around them and your ideas will lead to new foundations of how data scientists and others connect and build the AI models of the future. Your results will be tangible but also may include trying new concepts requiring creativity.  You will:Develop and apply advanced visualization techniques in a federated backend environment.Serve as subject-matter expert in demo’s and presentations to internal and external customersLead end-to-end steps involved in capturing user requirements and creating solutions.Mentor and educate others on best practices and latest techniquesTake the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:Essential Requirements:Extensive experience with GraphQLExperience with D3.js (preferred) ,CSS, and JavaScript.Experience in Web front-end development and in either React, Angular, or vue.jsAccomplished in industry-standard visual design applications and prototyping tools (Adobe Creative Cloud, XD, Axure RP, Figma, Sketch, etc.)Ability to deliver enterprise grade User Experiences with UI’s in large scale environmentsPassion for emerging technologies and latest in Graph, VR/AR and other UX related domainsTypically, this role requires 10+ years of relevant professional experience with a degree in Computer Science or equivalent professional experienceDesireable:Working knowledge of Cloud-based services (Azure, Google, AWS, PCF, etc.)Style control and dynamic response via CSS, code inspectionComfortable with Front End coding principles and practices to better relate and support developersAPI FederationDesign thinking learning, mentoring and advocacyExceptional communication skills as you may have to clearly articulate advanced concepts to a wide range of audiences Here’s our story; now tell us yoursDell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress. What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life — while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more. We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today. You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030 here.Dell is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment.
